mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board ( qna_idx, qna_title, qna_content, qna_regdate, qna_stt, qna_OPENSTATUS, member_idx) VALUES (seq_qna_idx.nextval, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, sysdate, #{qna_stt}, #{qna_OPENSTATUS}, #{member_idx})
mapper.select: SELECT qna_idx, qna_title, qna_content, qna_regdate, qna_stt, qna_OPENSTATUS, member_idx FROM qna_board WHERE qna_idx=#{qna_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_comment (qnacomm_idx, qnacomm_content, qnacomm_regdate, qna_idx, member_idx) values (seq_qnacomm_idx, #{qnacomm_content}, sysdate, #{qna_idx}, #{member_idx})
mapper.select: select * from (select tb.*,rownum rnum from ( select * from qna_board q inner join qna_comment qc on q.qna_idx = qc.qna_idx where q.qna_idx= qc.qna_idx )tb) where rnum between #{param1} and #{param2}

select * from ( select tb.*, rownum rnum from (SELECT * FROM qna_board a FULL OUTER JOIN qna_comment b ON a.qna_idx = b.qna_idx order by a.qna_idx desc )tb ) where rnum between #{param1} and #{param2}
